title: Paul Component Engineering Short Reach Canti Levers
content:
Paul Component Engineering loves making products for every rider. So they took its best-selling dual sealed-cartridge bearing CNC-machined Canti Lever, and redesigned the lever blade to sit closer to the handlebar to accommodate people who want a very short reach right out of the box…

Yet, some riders with bigger hands also like having short reach actuation on their levers and these work for them, too! Paul will still be offering its “Standard Reach” Canti Levers, this is just an additional configuration, now available directly on our website, or better yet, from your favorite local bike shop!

Select the “Short Reach” option from the drop-down menu on the Canti Lever PLP at Paul Component.

Specs:

  • Material: 6061 Aluminum
  • Weight: 134g Pair
  • Anodized Colors: Black, Purple, Silver or Pewter
  • Cable Pull: Short-Pull
  • Machined by us in sunny Chico, California
  • In stock: NOW

See more at Paul Component Engineering.
